label: Review Collection & Syndication
description: AI-optimized review collection with multi-channel syndication increasing review volume by 3-5x and achieving 25-35% submission rates through personalized timing.

traditional.workflow: 1. Generic review request email sent 7 days after purchase to all customers. 2. Single generic message ('Tell us what you think') with no personalization. 3. Reviews collected only on brand website (not syndicated to Google, third-party platforms). 4. No follow-up if customer doesn't respond to first request. 5. Typical 5-10% review submission rate from email campaigns.
constraints: Generic timing (7 days) doesn't account for product usage patterns
One-size-fits-all messaging doesn't resonate with diverse customers
Website-only reviews miss high-traffic third-party platforms (Google, Amazon)
No follow-up on initial request (miss engaged customers needing reminder)
5-10% submission rate means missing 90-95% of customer feedback
Can't prioritize happy customers vs at-risk for negative reviews

agentic.workflow: 1. Optimal Timing Agent personalizes review requests by product type: fast-moving goods (CPG, food) → 3-5 days, durable goods (appliances, electronics) → 14-30 days, services (travel, dining) → immediately post-experience. 2. Personalization Agent customizes messaging: reference specific product purchased, acknowledge customer tier (VIP vs first-time), adjust tone to customer sentiment signals. 3. Multi-Channel Syndication Agent distributes reviews to: brand website product pages, Google Business Profile, third-party platforms (Amazon, Trustpilot), social media showcase. 4. Follow-Up Agent sends reminder to non-responders after 5-7 days. 5. Negative Sentiment Detection routes dissatisfied customers to support before public review.
dataSources: Purchase history and product usage patterns
benefits: 3-5x increase in review volume through optimization
25-35% submission rate vs 5-10% generic approach
Personalized timing increases relevance and response
Multi-channel syndication maximizes review visibility and SEO
Negative sentiment routing prevents public complaints
Follow-up reminders capture additional 30-40% of respondents

quickWins: Personalize review request timing by product type

label: Review Response Automation
description: AI-generated review responses with sentiment-based routing reducing response time from 48+ hours to real-time while maintaining brand voice consistency across 100% of reviews.

traditional.workflow: 1. Community manager manually monitors review platforms for new reviews. 2. Respond to only critical negative reviews (1-2 stars) due to time constraints. 3. Type each response from scratch taking 5-10 minutes per review. 4. Positive reviews go unanswered (show lack of appreciation). 5. Average response time 24-48 hours for negative reviews, never for positive ones.
constraints: Manual monitoring doesn't scale (respond to <20% of reviews)
Only negative reviews addressed (positive customers ignored)
5-10 min per response limits capacity to 20-40 per day
24-48 hour response time shows lack of urgency
Brand voice inconsistent across different responders
Can't respond to volume spikes (busy seasons, viral reviews)

agentic.workflow: 1. Review Monitoring Agent tracks all incoming reviews across platforms in real-time. 2. Sentiment Routing Agent categorizes reviews: positive (4-5 stars) → appreciation response, neutral (3 stars) → engagement and improvement inquiry, negative (1-2 stars) → empathetic resolution offer, critical issues → immediate escalation to customer service. 3. Response Generation Agent creates brand-voice-aligned draft replies: thank positive reviewers with specific acknowledgment, address specific concerns in negative reviews, offer resolution pathways. 4. Human Review Agent sends drafts to manager for approval (optional by sentiment). 5. Auto-Publish Agent posts approved responses across platforms.
benefits: 100% review response vs <20% manual capacity
Real-time response to positive reviews (show appreciation)
24/7 monitoring and response vs business hours only
Consistent brand voice through AI-generated templates
Critical issues escalated immediately to customer service
Response time reduced from 24-48 hours to minutes

hitlGate.policy: Human review and approval of AI-generated response before posting

quickWins: Implement automated positive review thank-you responses
prerequisites: Brand voice AI model or templates

label: Sentiment Analysis & Insights
description: AI-powered NLP sentiment scoring with topic extraction and trend identification revealing actionable product insights and early warning of quality issues 70-90% faster.

traditional.workflow: 1. Product manager manually reads sample of recent reviews (20-30 per product). 2. Manually categorize themes (quality issues, shipping problems, sizing concerns). 3. Create monthly summary report showing average star rating. 4. Quality issues discovered after dozens of negative reviews accumulated. 5. No systematic tracking of sentiment trends or emerging issues.
constraints: Manual review of 20-30 samples misses broader patterns
Star ratings don't reveal why customers satisfied or dissatisfied
Monthly reporting too slow to catch emerging issues
Manual theme categorization inconsistent and time-consuming
Product quality problems not detected until significant negative reviews
Can't compare sentiment across products or time periods systematically

agentic.workflow: 1. Sentiment Scoring Agent analyzes all reviews with: overall sentiment (positive, neutral, negative), emotion detection (joy, frustration, disappointment), confidence scores. 2. Topic Extraction Agent identifies common themes: product quality and performance, shipping and packaging, customer service experience, value for money, specific features (size, color, durability). 3. Trend Analysis Agent detects: sentiment shifts over time, emerging issues (spike in complaints), seasonal patterns, competitive comparisons. 4. Insight Generation Agent surfaces actionable findings: products with declining sentiment, common friction points to address, features most praised or criticized. 5. Alert Agent notifies teams of critical trends.
benefits: 70-90% faster issue detection through real-time analysis
100% review coverage vs 20-30 sample-based insights
Topic extraction reveals specific product strengths and weaknesses
Trend detection identifies emerging issues before crisis
Actionable insights drive product improvements and messaging
Competitive benchmarking shows relative performance

quickWins: Implement sentiment scoring on all reviews
Deploy topic extraction for common themes

label: Review Fraud Detection
description: AI-powered fake review identification with suspicious pattern detection achieving 95%+ detection accuracy and protecting brand integrity from fraudulent reviews.

traditional.workflow: 1. Rely on review platform's basic fraud detection (IP address blocking). 2. Manually investigate suspicious reviews only when flagged by other customers. 3. Limited ability to detect incentivized or competitor-planted reviews. 4. No systematic pattern analysis across reviews. 5. Fake reviews inflate or deflate product ratings creating misleading impressions.
constraints: Platform-only fraud detection catches obvious cases only (same IP)
Reactive investigation after customer reports (fake reviews visible for days/weeks)
Can't detect sophisticated fraud (review farms, incentivized reviews)
No pattern analysis across multiple reviews to identify campaigns
Competitor sabotage with fake negative reviews goes undetected
Fake positive reviews create false expectations and customer disappointment

agentic.workflow: 1. Fraud Detection Agent analyzes multiple signals: review velocity (sudden spike in reviews), reviewer history (new accounts, single review only), language patterns (generic non-specific language, copied text), sentiment extremes (all 5-star or 1-star), verified purchase status. 2. Pattern Analysis Agent identifies coordinated campaigns: multiple reviews from same network, similar language patterns, suspicious timing patterns. 3. Authenticity Scoring Agent rates each review's credibility. 4. Verification Agent flags suspicious reviews for investigation or removal. 5. Reputation Protection Agent monitors for competitor sabotage attempts.
benefits: 95%+ fraud detection accuracy vs 60-70% manual
Real-time identification vs days/weeks delayed response
Sophisticated fraud detection (review farms, incentivized reviews)
Coordinated attack identification prevents brand sabotage
Authentic ratings improve customer trust and conversion
Reduced legal and reputation risk from fraudulent content

label: Review Display Optimization
description: AI-powered review presentation with verified badges, helpfulness voting, and intelligent sorting increasing conversion by 15-30% through improved trust and relevance.

traditional.workflow: 1. Display reviews in chronological order (most recent first). 2. Show average star rating prominently. 3. No verification badges or trust indicators. 4. No helpfulness voting or review quality indicators. 5. Customers must scroll through dozens of reviews to find relevant ones for their needs.
constraints: Chronological sorting doesn't surface most helpful reviews
Recent reviews may not be most relevant to customer's question
No trust signals (verified purchase) reduce review credibility
Can't filter or sort by specific attributes (size, use case)
Low-quality reviews mixed with high-quality detailed reviews
No social proof (helpfulness votes) to guide customers

agentic.workflow: 1. Smart Sorting Agent prioritizes review display: most helpful (based on votes), most relevant (to customer profile), verified purchases first, balanced sentiment (mix of ratings). 2. Trust Indicators Agent displays badges: verified purchase badge, early reviewer badge, detailed review badge (length/media). 3. Helpfulness Agent enables voting ('Was this helpful?') and learns from signals. 4. Filter & Search Agent allows sorting by: star rating, verified purchases only, specific attributes (size, color, use case), reviewer characteristics. 5. Summary Agent shows review highlights and common themes at top.
benefits: 15-30% conversion increase from improved review presentation
Most helpful reviews surfaced first vs chronological noise
Verified purchase badges increase trust and credibility
Smart filtering helps customers find relevant reviews for their needs
Review summary saves time and increases engagement
Helpfulness voting creates social proof and quality signal

label: Product Q&A Management
description: AI-powered question routing to experts with answer quality validation and search integration achieving 85-95% question resolution rate and 70-80% faster response time.

traditional.workflow: 1. Customer posts question on product page Q&A section. 2. Question visible to all website visitors hoping someone answers. 3. No routing to experts or existing customers who can answer. 4. 40-50% of questions go unanswered or receive poor quality responses. 5. Customer service team doesn't monitor Q&A (questions not escalated).
constraints: No expert routing (rely on random visitors to answer)
40-50% of questions unanswered hurts conversion
Poor quality answers provide incorrect information
Duplicate questions asked repeatedly (no search integration)
Product specialists and customer service not engaged
Slow response time (days to weeks if answered at all)

agentic.workflow: 1. Question Classification Agent categorizes questions: product specifications (route to product team), usage and how-to (route to existing owners), compatibility (route to technical support), availability and shipping (auto-answer from system). 2. Expert Routing Agent identifies best answerers: verified purchasers who used product, product specialists and support team, community members with relevant expertise. 3. Auto-Answer Agent responds instantly to: common questions (from FAQ knowledge base), specifications (from product data), availability and shipping (from systems). 4. Quality Validation Agent scores answers for accuracy and helpfulness. 5. Search Integration Agent surfaces existing Q&A to prevent duplicate questions.
benefits: 85-95% question resolution rate vs 50-60% organic
70-80% faster response time through expert routing
Auto-answer handles 30-40% of questions instantly
Quality validation ensures accurate information
Search integration reduces duplicate questions 50-60%
Product page conversion improves 10-20% with answered questions
metrics: Response time: Hours (instant for common questions)

quickWins: Implement auto-answer for common questions from FAQ
